00019 --
00020 -- unit name: produced_rom
00021 --
00022 --! @brief ROM that stores the fixed parts of Produced variables.
00023 --!
00024 --! Used in the NanoFIP design. \n
00025 --! This ROM stores the fixed parts of Produced variables, including the
00026 --! full contents of the Presence variable.\n
00027 --! Reading is controlled by the tx_engine.
00028 --!
00029 --! SEE mitigation techniques used:
00030 --! The ROM will not need any SEE mitigation techniques as the FlashROM used
00031 --! in the Actel is supposedly not upsettable.
00032 --! Of course it may also be implemented as logic generating the 15 or so
00033 --! constants.
00034 --! 
00035 --! @attention The FlashROM of a ProASIC3 has a maximum clock frequency of
00036 --! 15 MHz and a Tcko of up to 29 ns!
00037 --!
00038 --! @author Erik van der Bij (Erik.van.der.Bij@cern.ch)
00039 --
00040 --! @date 06/07/2009
00041 --
00042 --! @version v0.01
00043 --
00044 --! @details 
00045 --!
00046 --! <b>Dependencies:</b>
00047 --! - tx_engine
00048 --! - data_if
00049 --!
00050 --! <b>References:</b>\n
00051 --! 
00052 --! 
00053 --!
00054 --! <b>Modified by:</b>\n
00055 --! Author: Erik van der Bij
00056 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 --! \n\n<b>Last changes:</b>\n
00058 --! 07/07/2009  v0.01  EB  First version \n
00059 --!
00060 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 --! @todo Define I/O signals \n
00062 --!
00063 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00067 --============================================================================
00068 --! Entity declaration for consumed_rom
00069 --============================================================================
00070 entity produced_rom is
00071 
00072 port (
00073 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 -- Connections to wf_tx_rx (WorldFIP received data)
00075 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 
00077 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 --  Connections to wf_engine
00079 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 
00081 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 --  Connections to data_if
00083 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 
00085 
00086    du1_i     : in  std_logic; --! Strobe
00087    du2_o     : out std_logic; --! Acknowledge
00088    du3_i     : in  std_logic  --! Write enable
00089 
00090 );
00091 
00092 end entity produced_rom;
